home.title: A living bridge between Spain and China
home.caption: We are an association created by people who have lived in China and know the vertigo of starting from scratch. Here, what matters is you: your curiosity, your desire to learn and connect. We are united by building a cultural and professional bridge, regardless of age, origin, identity, or orientation.

section1.title: 1. General Information
section1.body: Creasia is an entity dedicated to organizing cultural activities, trips, training, and consulting between Spain and China. Accessing and using this website implies acceptance of these legal terms.

section2.title: 2. Personal Data Protection
section2.body1: Personal data provided through Creasia’s forms will be processed in accordance with the applicable data protection regulations (EU Regulation 2016/679 and Spanish Organic Law 3/2018).
section2.body2: The purpose of the processing is to manage the relationship with users, send information about Creasia’s activities, news, and services, and handle inquiries. Data will not be transferred to third parties except where required by law.
section2.body3Before: Users may exercise their rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, objection, and portability via the
section2.body4: If you wish to unsubscribe from our communications, you may also request it through the same contact page.

section3.title: 3. Disclaimer on Trips and Activities
section3.body1: Creasia acts as an intermediary in organizing trips and cultural activities, collaborating with external providers. It is not responsible for any incidents, delays, cancellations, itinerary changes, accidents, losses, or damages that may occur during the trips or activities.
section3.body2: Participants are responsible for meeting the legal and health requirements necessary to travel, as well as for taking out the appropriate insurance.

section4.title: 4. Content and Intellectual Property
section4.body1: All content on this website, including texts, images, logos, and designs, is owned by Creasia or its respective holders and is protected by intellectual property law.
section4.body2: Reproduction, distribution, or public communication of the content is prohibited without express authorization.

section5.title: 5. External Links
section5.body1: This website may contain links to external pages. Creasia is not responsible for the content, accuracy, or operation of those pages, nor for any damages that may result from accessing them.

section6.title: 6. Updates and Changes
section6.body1: Creasia reserves the right to modify, update, or remove any information on this website, as well as this legal policy, at any time and without prior notice.

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section7.body1: These legal terms are governed by Spanish law. For any dispute arising from access to or use of this website, the parties submit to the Courts and Tribunals of Madrid, unless otherwise provided by law.

gourmet.title: Gourmet Pass
gourmet.leadBody: invites you to discover the authentic essence of Chinese gastronomy in Madrid with our Gourmet Passport.
gourmet.secondParagraph: With it you can enjoy exclusive discounts, special menus, and even free dishes at a selection of Chinese restaurants carefully chosen by the Creasia association.
gourmet.benefitsIntro: The Gourmet Passport is much more than a benefits card:
gourmet.benefit1: It invites you to travel through the diversity of regional Chinese cuisine without leaving Madrid.
gourmet.benefit2: It encourages you to discover new gastronomic corners of the city.
gourmet.benefit3: And it makes you part of a community that celebrates Eastern culture in all its forms.
gourmet.step1: Get your Creasia Gourmet Pass when you become a member: it will be sent to your email in electronic format.
gourmet.step2: Show your passport at participating restaurants.
gourmet.step3: Enjoy unique experiences with exclusive benefits.
gourmet.closing1: Because the best way to approach a culture is to taste it.
gourmet.closing2: With the Gourmet Passport, every dish will be a new chapter in your journey through the tradition and innovation of Chinese cuisine.

consultoria.title: Consulting
consultoria.caption: Tailor-made strategies to connect cultures, teams, and businesses between Spain and China.
consultoria.body1: We analyze your project and define the landing strategy so your goals in the Chinese or Spanish market are viable and sustainable.
consultoria.body2: We work with a network of specialists in culture, communication, and business development to support you at every stage of the process.
consultoria.service2: Commercial support and search for strategic partners.
consultoria.service3: In-company training for teams in international transition.
consultoria.contact: Tell us about your challenge and we’ll design a tailored proposal for your organization.
